name: write_blog_post
description: FINAL STEP: Write the complete blog post in Markdown format. YOU MUST provide the full blog content in the markdown_content parameter - this is not optional. The markdown_content parameter must contain the entire blog post (3000+ words). This is the termination tool - call this only when you have the complete blog post ready.

markdown_content.description: REQUIRED: The complete blog post in Markdown format. Must include: YAML frontmatter (title, meta_description, target_keyword, author, date), H1 title, all sections with H2/H3 headings, image placeholders as ![alt text](IMAGE_1), bullet points, bold/italic formatting, and a conclusion with call-to-action. Should be 3000+ words, comprehensive, and publish-ready. Reference generated images using IMAGE_1, IMAGE_2, etc. placeholders.

word_count.description: Actual word count of the blog post (should be 3000+)

seo_notes.description: Brief notes on SEO optimization applied (keyword placement, heading structure, etc.)
